index.hero-text: ¡Bienvenido a nuestro albergue, el más céntrico de Edimburgo, donde la limpieza y el servicio al cliente son nuestras principales prioridades! Somos conscientes de la importancia de una buena relación calidad-precio a la hora de viajar, por eso ofrecemos un alojamiento cómodo y asequible a nuestros huéspedes. Nuestro amable y dedicado personal está disponible para asegurarse de que tenga una excelente estadía. Ya sea que esté explorando la ciudad y más allá o simplemente necesite un lugar para descansar, lo tenemos cubierto. ¡Reserve su estadía con nosotros hoy y experimente la mejor relación calidad-precio en el centro de Edimburgo!
index.card-1-text: Ofrecemos una variedad de opciones de habitaciones para satisfacer sus necesidades, habitaciones dobles y cuádruples, dormitorios pequeños y tambien mas grandes. Los huéspedes pueden disfrutar de nuestras instalaciones comunes, como una cocina totalmente equipada y una sala de estar. Perfecto para cocinar sus propias comidas, socializar y relajarse después de un largo día de turismo.
index.card-2-text: Estamos especializados en alojar grupos con tarifas preferenciales para estancias inolvidables en la capital escocesa. Ya sea que sea un grupo de amigos, un equipo deportivo o un grupo escolar, estamos aquí para hacer que su estadía en Edimburgo sea asequible, cómoda y memorable.
index.card-3-text: Puede reservar los mejores tours en Edimburgo y Escocia directamente a través de nuestro sitio asociado. Nos hemos asociado con los mejores operadores turísticos locales para ofrecerle una variedad de tours que se adapten a sus intereses y presupuesto. Reserve su recorrido hoy y descubra la belleza de Escocia con facilidad.

rooms.db-rooms-description: Bright private rooms with double style beds. These are perfect for couples, friends or anyone who prefers privacy while still enjoying the hostel environment. All private rooms are fitted with a bedside table, a lamp and an armchair. The bathrooms remained shared.
rooms.shared-rooms-description: Bright 4 to 10 bed rooms for individuals, small groups and families. One of our dorms is female only so that everyone can feel comfortable. If you fancy making friends and enjoy the essence of what a hostel is you will love the budget friendly dorms!
rooms.private-rooms-description: Bright and spacious 4, 9 and 12 private bed rooms for friends, groups and families. Now you can book a privacy friendly room.

faq.question: When is the payment fullfiled?
faq.answer: Payments are taken two days prior to arrival.

faq.question: Do you have WIFI?
faq.answer: The WiFi works great and you can connect from every room in the hostel and in the lounge area where there are tables you can work from.

faq.question: What about the lockers?
faq.answer: The room has lockable lockers and you can either buy a lock from us (£4) or bring your own!

faq.question: Do you serve breakfast?
faq.answer:
We can offer Breakfast at £3.90 though we are not the ones cooking, it is the cafe downstairs.

Breakfast consists of a barista style coffee/hot drink + a filled roll or pancakes.

So far our guests are happy with it.

faq.question: Is it possible to cook my own food?
faq.answer:
We have big a kitchen with many cooking utensils, ovens and hobs, a microwave, etc. We have free salt, spices, instant coffee, tea and sugar.

We don't provide a dinner service but you are welcome to cook something for yourself.

faq.question: Can I do my laundry?
faq.answer: We do not provide a laundry service, however there is a laundrette 10 minutes walk away : Bendix Self Service.

faq.question: Can I have a lower bunk bed?
faq.answer: We have a first come first serve policy regarding bed allocation though we are sure we'll have a comfortable bed for you when you arrive.

faq.question: Where can I park my car?
faq.answer:
We are right in the town centre and there is no good spot.

The best is to download the app Ringgo, otherwise there is paid parking on Waterloo Place, St Andrews Square or George Square.

From 6.30pm till 8.30am, on-street-parking is virtually free.

faq.question: Is there a place to park my bike?
faq.answer: Yes, we have a secure place for your bike. However our hostel is at the top of a building so there are quite a few steps to get up to us.

faq.question: Your question is left unanswered?
faq.answer: Don't hesitate to reach out on Whatsapp.
